name: Dornoch
pedigree: Good Magic - Puca by Big Brown
comments: Full brother to 2023 Kentucky Derby winner Mage
Tried different strategy in Blue Grass Stakes, didn't work
Beat Sierra Leone in the Remsen
Crushed a weak field in Fountain of Youth
Seems to run best when on the lead and battling another horse
When alone on the lead, seams bored, uninterested

name: Sierra Leone
pedigree: Gun Runner - Heavenly Love by Malibu Moon
comments: Outstanding closing speed, will be a factor late in the race
Absolutely HATE the 2 post for this horse
Tricky trip required - can't fall too far behind and can't get boxed in near the rail
I'm an occassional HHH Podcast viewer, so I feel contractually obligated to cheer for this horse

name: Mystik Dan
pedigree: Goldencents - Ma'am by Colonel John
comments: Ok showing in AR Derby; rallied for 3rd place points
Ran well in the rain (Southwest)
I'm not a fan of the fields in the Arkansas prep races, so questioning competition

name: Catching Freedom
pedigree: Constitution - Catch My Drift by Pioneerof the Nile
comments: Nice progress, improvement throughout three year old races
Best performance and most imporved horse in LA Derby
Oustanding closing speed, will be factor with a good trip

name: Catalytic
pedigree: Catalina Cruiser - One Show Only by Distorted Humor
comments: Toss for me - weak field in Florida Derby after weird set of scratches

name: Just Steel
pedigree: Justify - Irish Lights by Fastnet Rock
comments: Good horse, fairly consistent this year
Will need more improvement to be elite horse in this division

name: Honor Marie
pedigree: Honor Code - Dame Marie by Smart Strike
comments: I won't rule him out - but I'm not a fan of this horse
Good showing in LA Derby, however well beaten by Collecting Freedom
Great post, could be a factor late in race with a great trip

name: Just a Touch
pedigree: Justify - Touching Beauty by Tapit
comments: Toss for me - too lightly raced to be ready for this race
Sans Sierra Leone, I don't think it was a good field in Blue Grass Stakes
Good case - A Justify colt, A LOT of upside, good trip could be factor

name: Encino
pedigree: Nyquist - Glittering Jewel by Bernardini
comments: Scratched - I don't think he would have been a factor
Looking forward to future races

name: T O Password
pedigree: Copano Rickey - T O Rachel by King Kamehameha
comments: Japan RTKD Invite
A Japan horse will win Kentucky Derby someday, just not sure about this year

name: Forever Young (JPN)
pedigree: Real Steel - Forever Darling by Congrats
comments: My limited knowledge - seems like best Japan horse in Kentucky Derby
If jockey can pace horse, will be a factor
Great time figures, great post

name: Track Phantom
pedigree: Quality Road - Miss Sunset by Into Mischief
comments: Solid, early speed horse; may be a better sprinter
Great run from outside post in Risen Star, but was clipped at the wire by Sierra Leone
Good post draw - will need a fast start to have a chance

name: West Saratoga
pedigree: Exaggerator - Mo Wicked by Uncle Mo
comments: Toss for me - points earned in weak prep races

name: Endlessly
pedigree: Oscar Performance - Dream Fuhrever by Langfuhr
comments: Toss for me - points earned in weak prep race
Dominating performance in Jeff Ruby Steaks
Has not run on a dirt track - four turf races and two all weather tracks

name: Domestic Product
pedigree: Practical Joke - Goods And Services by Paynter
comments: Improved each race; Good closing speed; Longer distance would be good
I'm unsure about competition in prep races, but liked the horse in each race
Under the radar horse for me - I think he will be a factor late with a good trip

name: Grand Mo the First
pedigree: Uncle Mo - Lilies So Fair by Giant's Causeway
comments: Toss for me - ok performances in weak prep races

name: Fierceness
pedigree: City of Light - Nonna Bella by Stay Thirsty
comments: Top selection based on connections, post position, etc
Will need a fast start and a clean trip from outside post
Outstanding in Florida Derby and Breeders' Cup Juvenille
Found trouble in a couple races when he did not break well out of gate
A horse that either wins or does not finish in the money

name: Stronghold
pedigree: Ghostzapper - Spectator by Jimmy Creed
comments: Solid, consistent horse
I question the West Coast circuit this year, so will need to improve against better competition
Not a total toss for me, but will need a lot to go well to be a factor late in the race

name: Resilience
pedigree: Into Mischief - Meadowsweet by Smart Strike
comments: Wired field from inside post in Wood Memorial
Talented, but young horse that will need to continue improvement to be a factor in Kentucky Derby
Too far outside post for me in this race
Looking forward to future races with this horse

name: Society Man
pedigree: Good Magic - You Cheated by Colonel John
comments: Toss for me - points earned in weak prep races

name: Epic Ride
pedigree: Blame - Pick a Time by Gio Ponti
comments: Toss for me - points earned in weak prep races

name: Mugatu
pedigree: Blofeld - Union Way by Union Rags
comments: Toss for me - points earned in weak prep races
